snippet.title: Bakumatsu Rock(PSP) - Rolling Thunder(Normal)
snippet.description:
I may do a full playthrough after I finish this game first time around..

The gist of this games plot is that the Shinsengumi are hypnotizing people with a powerful sort of music called the Heaven Song and a few other historical figures combat against them with the Power of Ultra Soul and Rock and Roll..Pretty crazy and quirky as an idea but I like it..Also it will get an Anime Adaptation around July in the summer.
